pageProduct.name: Pentavite Immune Support Daily Kids 60 Chewable Tablets
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Pentavite® Immune Support Daily Kids Chewables is a premium formulation containing Vitamin C and Zinc to support healthy immune system function in children.

This great tasting formula also contains Elderflower, to reduce common cold symptoms such as excess mucous and coughs, as traditionally used in Western Herbal Medicine.

With natural tropical flavour, Pentavite® Immune Support Daily Kids Chewables Is a great tasting formula kids will love!
  • No artificial sweeteners 
  • No added artificial colours or flavours 
  • No added dairy 
  • No added gluten 
  • Vegetarian friendly 
Dedicated to Children's Health

Suitable For: Vegetarian friendly. 2 - 12 years old.

Product Claims: Supports healthy immune system function

Boxed Contents: 60 Chewable Tablets

Size: 60 Tablets

Dermatologist Tested?: n/a

Dermatologically Tested?: n/a

Soap-Free?: n/a

SPF: n/a

Alcohol Free?: Yes

KEY FEATURES

• Supports healthy immune system function
• Supports general health and wellbeing
• Contains antioxidants Vitamin C and Zinc, which reduce free radicals formed in the body
• Contains Elderflower, as traditionally used in Western Herbal Medicine, to reduce common cold symptoms such as excess mucous and coughs.

Warnings

Do not use if seal under cap is broken or missing.
Contains sulfites. Not to be used in children under 2 years of age without medical advice and not suitable for infants under the age of 12 months. If symptoms persist, consult your health professional. Vitamin and mineral supplements should not replace a balanced diet.

IMPORTANT INFORMATION

Supports general health and wellbeing.

Ingredients

Active Ingredients: Each chewable tablet contains:
Vitamin A (from retinol palmitate 137.5 microgram) 75 microgram RE (25 IU).
Vitamin C (as ascorbic acid from calcium ascorbate dihydrate 302.59mg) 250mg.
Vitamin D3 (Colecalciferol) 6.2 microgram (248IU).
Zinc (from Zinc citrate dihydrate 6.22mg) 2mg.
Citrus Bioflavonoids Extract 50mg.
Elderflower (Sambucus nigra) extract dry concentrate 129mg equiv. dry flower 1.8g
Manuka Honey (honey) 15mg.

Contains: Contains Sulfites

Allergen Contains: Sulphites

Allergen Free From: Dairy| Gluten

Directions

Chew, do not swallow whole. Take with food.

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Store below 25°C.

Storage Temperature: Below 25°C.

RECYCLABLE INFORMATION

Please recycle.

Recyclable Packaging?: Yes
